I'm a huge SW fan\, so writing this brief review is painful.

in Ep VII\, Han tells Finn 'That's not how the force work's! Well someone should have explained that to RJ!

Leia in space. Worst scene ever! What were they thinking!

Snoke. Turns out to be the most useless bad guy ever\, no answers to him or what He was. What's the point?

Luke. Out of character and ruined him for me despite Hammils best efforts. The ending of His ark was also totally wasted.

Force powers are ridiculous.  Why did the Jedi ever communicate with hologram if they can be omnipresent!?

The plot. It's a mess. Some scenes\, especially in the Casino are actually pointless and not relevant to the story and felt like a separate mini film.

Exposition! I don't remember in Jedi hearing 3 different versions of the cast explaining how they were going to recur Han. Well that's what you get here. The characters only seem to talk to explain to the audience what's going on or what they're about to do.

Gutted. They're are some amazing scenes in this film and at times it is really good but its fundamentally flawed!
